oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Isoniazid Therapy in Bovine Practice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Schwarm, Mark A.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Isoniazid
cattle
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The basis of my talk is that here is a drug that is antibacterial with penetrating ability into fibrous tissue. To me, Isoniazid is indicated in chronic respiratory, soft tissue and bone infections in cattle and is definitely an economical addition to my treatment regimen.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 1983; 173-174
